content: उष्ट्रः [उष्-ट्रन्-किच्च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 161</ls>] {@--1@} A camel; अथोष्ट्रवामीशतवाहितार्थं <ls>R. 5. 32</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 162</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 120</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 202.</ls> {@--2@} A buffalo. {@--3@} A bull with a hump. {@--4@} A cart or carriage. --ष्ट्री {@--1@} A she-camel. {@--2@} An earthen vessel in the shape of a camel. [<ab>cf.</ab> Pers. {%ushtar%}; Zend {%ustra%}.]
